title: Video: Lykke Li – Sadness Is a Blessing
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/lykke-li.png "lykke li")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7150-video-lykke-li-sadness-is-a-blessing/attachment/lykke-li)

As a rule, **Lykke Li’s** videos are interesting because they embrace the medium as a chance to tell a story rather than simply showcasing the face of a given artist. **[Tarik Saleh](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0757975/)**’s latest offering for ‘_Sadness is a Blessing_’ is no different. It features Li getting slowly more and more wasted in a restaurant, and eventually drunkenly dancing for the rest of the song. It’s pitifully sad at times, but also manages to uplift and satisfy. Check it out bellow.

[Lykke Li – Sadness is a Blessing (Director Tarik Saleh)](http://vimeo.com/22935185) from [Lykke Li](http://vimeo.com/lykkeli) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
